traits.Aura of Blood Thirst: If the flind isn't incapacitated, any creature with the Rampage trait can make a bite attack as a bonus action while within 10 feet of the flind.

actions.Multiattack: The flind makes three attacks: one with each of its different flail attacks or three with its longbow.
actions.Flail of Madness: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d8 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a DC 16+1d8 + 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target must make a melee attack against a random target within its reach on its next turn. If it has no targets within its reach even after moving, it loses its action on that turn.
actions.Flail of Pain: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d8 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 22 (4d10) psychic damage.
actions.Flail of Paralysis: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d8 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16+1d8 + 12 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.
actions.Longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d8 + 0 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.
